summary: This document is an email exchange between Samantha Harmon and Paul Morris discussing a pre-KYC (Know Your Customer) meeting regarding Jeffrey Epstein. Harmon suggests that Andrew Gallivan can handle the matter due to the tight schedule of another individual referred to as Chip.

persons.name: Samantha Harmon
persons.context: Samantha Harmon is coordinating a meeting and suggests Andrew Gallivan can handle a discussion regarding Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.context: Andrew Gallivan is mentioned as someone who can handle the discussion about Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the subject of the pre-KYC discussion mentioned in the email.

persons.name: Chip
persons.context: Chip is mentioned as having a tight schedule, which affects the timing of the meeting.

connections.description: Samantha Harmon is working under Paul Morris as his Executive Assistant.
Paul Morris is discussing a pre-KYC meeting regarding Jeffrey Epstein, indicating a client-advisor relationship.
Samantha Harmon suggests Andrew Gallivan can handle the discussion about Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The email discusses a pre-KYC meeting regarding Jeffrey Epstein.
Samantha Harmon is coordinating the meeting and suggests Andrew Gallivan can handle it.
Paul Morris is involved in the discussion and is a Managing Director at Deutsche Bank.
